channel.title: Npc training
channel.description:
How do i make it so you can only train on npc's? I want to be able to train:
Magic on npc's. Attack on npc's. defense on npc's. Strenght on npc's. Range on npc's. Hitpoints on npc's.
[b]And when you bury bones you get prayer xp.[/b]
Please [u]DONT[/u] spam this topic. I just wan't to know how. If you don't know how, just don't post. Please somone help me. Thanks!
~eric

item.title: Npc training

item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

How do i make it so you can only train on npc’s? I want to be able to train:

defense on npc’s.
